title: Build macOS App for Fathom
description: Create a native macOS application for Fathom using SwiftUI that reuses the existing FathomKit framework. This will allow developers to test Universal Links from their Mac.

title: Add macOS app target to Xcode project
description: Add a new macOS application target to the existing Fathom.xcodeproj. Configure the target with appropriate bundle identifier, deployment target (macOS 12+), and basic app structure.

title: Build Add Website sheet
description: Create a sheet/modal for adding new websites. Include text field for URL input, validation using AASAURLSuggestor, loading indicator while fetching AASA, error handling for invalid URLs or missing AASA files.

title: Build AASA Detail View
description: Create detail view showing AASA structure: display raw JSON, list associated apps with icons from iTunes API, show applinks/webcredentials/activitycontinuation sections, last fetched date.

title: Build App Info section with iTunes integration
description: Display associated apps in detail view. Fetch app metadata from iTunes Search API (name, icon, developer, App Store link). Show app icons with async image loading. Handle cases where app is not found on App Store.

title: Build Universal Links paths list
description: Display all Universal Link paths/components from the AASA file. Support both legacy format (paths array) and modern format (components with path/query/fragment). Show exclusion patterns clearly (NOT prefix).

title: Build Link Testing View
description: Create view for testing Universal Links. List all paths with test buttons. Clicking test opens the link - try registered app first, fall back to browser. Include copy to clipboard button for each link.

title: Build Custom Link Composer
description: Create interface for composing custom test URLs. Allow editing path, query parameters, and fragment. Preview the full URL. Test button to open the composed link. Save custom links per website.

title: Build Settings/Preferences window
description: Create macOS standard Preferences window (Settings on macOS 13+). Include: links to Apple validation tools, links to Branch.io validator, about section with version info, GitHub link.

title: Add macOS menu bar items
description: Implement standard macOS menu bar: File menu (Add Website, Close), Edit menu (Copy Link), View menu (Refresh), Window menu. Follow Apple HIG for menu organization.

title: Implement keyboard shortcuts
description: Add standard macOS keyboard shortcuts: ⌘N for new website, ⌘R for refresh, ⌘W for close window, ⌘, for preferences, ⌘C for copy selected link, Delete for remove website.

title: Add drag-and-drop URL support
description: Enable drag-and-drop functionality: drop URLs onto app icon in Dock to add website, drop URLs onto main window to add website. Handle both text URLs and Safari bookmark drags.

title: Configure FathomKit framework for macOS
description: Update FathomKit framework build settings to support macOS platform. Add macOS to supported platforms list and ensure the framework builds successfully for macOS.

title: Support multiple windows
description: Enable opening multiple windows showing different AASA details simultaneously. Use WindowGroup or DocumentGroup as appropriate. Each window should maintain independent state.

title: Implement window state restoration
description: Save and restore window state between app launches: window size, position, selected website, sidebar collapsed state. Use @SceneStorage or NSUserDefaults as appropriate.

title: Add Touch Bar support
description: Optional: Add Touch Bar support for MacBook Pro users. Include quick actions: add website, refresh, test selected link. Lower priority as Touch Bar is being phased out.

title: Design macOS app icon
description: Create macOS app icon following Apple HIG. macOS icons have different style than iOS (more detailed, can have depth/shadows). Need 16x16 through 1024x1024 sizes. Consider hiring designer or using existing iOS icon as base.

title: Add Help menu and documentation
description: Create Help menu with: link to GitHub documentation, keyboard shortcut reference, what are Universal Links explanation, how to use AASA files guide.

title: Configure app for notarization
description: Set up app for Apple notarization to distribute outside App Store. Enable hardened runtime, configure entitlements, set up signing certificate. Test notarization with xcrun notarytool.

title: Prepare Mac App Store submission
description: Prepare app for Mac App Store: create App Store Connect record, write app description and keywords, take screenshots (standard Mac sizes), configure sandbox entitlements, submit for review.

title: Create DMG for direct distribution
description: Create DMG installer for distributing outside App Store. Include background image, app icon, Applications folder alias. Automate with create-dmg or similar tool. Sign and notarize the DMG.

title: Set up CI/CD for macOS builds
description: Extend existing Travis CI or migrate to GitHub Actions for macOS builds. Configure: build on push, run tests, create signed release artifacts, upload to GitHub Releases.

title: Update README with macOS installation instructions
description: Update project README to include: macOS system requirements, installation via App Store, installation via DMG, Homebrew cask (if applicable), feature comparison with iOS version.

title: Set minimum macOS deployment target
description: Set minimum deployment target to macOS 12+ to leverage modern SwiftUI features like NavigationSplitView, searchable modifier, and improved performance.

title: Audit FathomKit for iOS-specific APIs
description: Review all FathomKit source files for iOS-specific APIs that won't compile on macOS. Key areas to check: UIApplication.shared.open() needs to become NSWorkspace.shared.open(), any UIKit imports need conditional compilation with #if canImport(UIKit).

title: Add conditional compilation for platform-specific code
description: Wrap iOS-specific code in #if canImport(UIKit) blocks and add macOS equivalents using #if canImport(AppKit). Create platform abstraction layer if needed for URLOpener and similar protocols.

title: Update UserDataStore paths for macOS
description: macOS has different sandboxing rules than iOS. Update UserDataStore to use appropriate paths for macOS (Application Support directory vs Documents). Handle migration if user has existing data.

title: Run and fix FathomKitTests on macOS
description: Execute the FathomKit test suite on macOS and fix any failing tests. Ensure all 8 test files pass: AASATests, AASAURLSuggestorTests, AppPathTests, AppLinksTests, AppDetailTests, AppIDTests, iTunesSearchAPITests, FathomUIKitTests.

title: Build main window with NavigationSplitView
description: Create the main app window using SwiftUI NavigationSplitView with sidebar-based navigation. Sidebar shows list of saved AASA files, main content area shows detail view. Support collapsible sidebar.

title: Build AASA List View (sidebar)
description: Create SwiftUI view displaying all saved websites/AASA files in the sidebar. Include: add new website button in toolbar, delete via swipe or context menu, refresh button, search/filter functionality.
